title: ABB Shares Cross Above 200 DMA - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of ABB Ltd (Symbol: ABB) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $19.27, changing hands as high as $19.37 per share. ABB Ltd shares are currently trading up about 1.9% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of ABB shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
